O Lord, Your love has touched me. Your love has wrecked me. Jesus, Jesus. Wow Lord Jesus Your love has wrecked me and we want to live only for You!!

This is my truth: I don’t deserve Him, oh, a sinner like me, My explanation, friends, it’s just His mercy. Because of that, help me Lord to be totally Yours. O Lord I don't like to keep anything for myself, I want to belong totally to You.

Ah...I love the Lord so, so much. This hymn demonstrates and expresses my experience of finally seeing Christ as Reality. I never thought that God could be enjoyable. Oh...thank You, Lord. Lord, I love You so much. And I know even these words are meaningless and vain but may they be a sweet, sweet offering in Your sight. Amen.
I cant help it. There's no one like the Lord. I just want my experience of Him to go to the extreme.
Lord Jesus I love You. And I thank You for this great love toward me. Though I am a sinner but still You love me. Your great love has reached me.

What a nice hymn! Thank You Lord for loving me, thank You for Your mercy. I desire to love You more. Oh Lord Jesus I love You too.

oh Lord, Your mercy reached me! Though I'm a sinner who does not deserve You, Lord, You loved me still! When we sang this hymn during our young people's meeting, I just felt that I loved the Lord more!
Lord, I love You so much! Lord, keep me faithfully to You unto the end. Thank You for Your mercy, Lord. Again, I love You so much, Lord.
Thank you for posting this song. The power of the Lord is shown forth.
